content: k10 kfb k1 turn - 16 right sleeve sts row 12 purl row 26 pfb p14 pfb turn - 18 right sleeve sts row 13 k1 kfb knit to last 2 sts kfb k1- 35sts row 27 k1 kfb k14 kfb k1 turn - 20 right sleeve sts row 14-15 repeat last 2 row once- 37sts row 28-32 beginning with a purl row work five row stocking stitch on just row 16 purl the 20 right sleeve sts sleeves set-up join on the fur yarn b and work with both yarn a and b together as follows row 17 k8 kfb k4 kfb k9 kfb k4 kfb k8 to end of row - 41sts row 33 rs purl on a knit row row 18 & 20 purl row 34 ws -35 beginning with a knit row work two row stocking stitch row 19 k8 kfb k6 kfb k9 kfb k6 kfb k8 to end of row - 45sts cast off all 20 right sleeve cuff sts knit-wise row 21 k8 kfb k8 kfb k9 kfb k8 kfb k8 to end of row - 49sts right front row 22 purl rs facing rejoin yarn a to 8 right front sts on your left needle continue as divide sleeves as follows follows row 23 kfb k6 kfb twice k10 kfb turn flip work over so purl-side faces row 23 kfb k6 kfb 10 right front sts left sleeve row 24 p10 turn row 24 purl 14 left sleeve sts turn flip work over so knit-side faces row 25 kfb k9 to end of row 11 right front sts row 25 k1 kfb k10 kfb k1 turn flip work over so purl-side faces - 16 left row 26 p10 pfb turn 12 right front sts sleeve sts row 27 kfb k10 kfb 14 right front sts row 26 pfb p14 pfb turn flip work over so knit-side faces - 18 left sleeve sts row 28-30 beginning with a purl row work three row stocking stitch on just row 27 k1 kfb k14 kfb k1 turn flip work over so purl-side faces - 20 left the 14 right front sts sleeve sts after the last purl row cut the yarn and slide all 14 right front sts onto a safety row 28-32 beginning with a purl row work five row stocking stitch on just the pin or circular needle until needed 20 left sleeve sts join on the fur yarn b and work with both yarn a and b together as follows row 33 rs purl on a knit row row 34 ws -35 beginning with a knit row work two row stocking stitch cast off all 20 left sleeve cuff sts knit-wise you ll now work on the coat back as follows row 38-40 beginning with a purl row work three row stocking stitch ws facing rejoin yarn a to the first 11 on your left needle continue as follows join on the fur yarn b and work with both yarn a and
